title: cabbage soup
ingredients: 1 (14-15 oz) can cooked white beans (drained and rinsed)
instructions: Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the carrots, onion, celery, salt, and several grinds of pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 8 minutes, until the vegetables begin to soften.
Stir in the white wine vinegar.
Add the fire-roasted tomatoes, vegetable broth, white beans, grated garlic, diced potatoes, chopped cabbage, and dried thyme. Stir to combine.
Cover the pot and simmer for 30 to 60 minutes, or until the potatoes and cabbage are very tender.
Taste and adjust seasoning with salt, broth base and pepper if needed.
Serve the soup garnished with fresh parsley, if using.
